channel.title: Looking after your Mental Health as an Entrepreneur
channel.description:
We (Business of Software) are hosting a free, live Q&A with Dr Sherry Walling tomorrow (August 16th, 12.00 ET/5pm BST) to discuss how to look after your mental health as an entrepreneur - if it's a topic of interest, do join us. Sherry is a licensed clinical psychologist and all around great person - incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. You may have heard her speak at MicroConf or Business of Software Conference, or read her book 'The Entrepreneur's Guide To Keeping Your Sh*t Together'. You can register for the webinar below - if you can't join us live, we'll send you a replay afterwards.
https://zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_3gh7B-KKSw2-9pA8SmLeAA

item.title: Looking after your Mental Health as an Entrepreneur

item.description:
We (Business of Software) are hosting a free, live Q&A with Dr Sherry Walling tomorrow (August 16th, 12.00 ET/5pm BST) to discuss how to look after your mental health as an entrepreneur - if it’s a topic of interest, do join us. Sherry is a licensed clinical psychologist and all around great person - incredibly knowledgeable and helpful. You may have heard her speak at MicroConf or Business of Software Conference, or read her book ‘The Entrepreneur’s Guide To Keeping Your Sh*t Together’. You can register for the webinar below - if you can’t join us live, we’ll send you a replay afterwards.

Zoom Video

Welcome! You are invited to join a webinar: Mental Health In Tech - Hangout with...

Dr. Sherry Walling is a licensed psychologist and the co-host of the ZenFounder podcast. She helps high-performing professionals maximize their potential while also maintaining life satisfaction and personal fulfillment. She regularly consults about...
